sentences.en: "Actually, most of my tennis is at club level," he admitted.
sentences.cn: “说实话，我的网球基本上属于业余水平，”他承认说。

sentences.en: Did those directors act in the best interests of their club?
sentences.cn: 那些董事行事时是以他们俱乐部的最大利益为出发点吗？

sentences.en: For more information concerning the club contact I. Coldwell.
sentences.cn: 咨询俱乐部详情，请与I.科德维尔联系。

sentences.en: if you're confused, join the club!.
sentences.cn: 如果你感到困惑，我也一样！。

sentences.en: People at the club think very highly of him.
Shall we go to a club?
She is a pole dancer at London's famous Spearmint Rhino club.
sentences.cn: 她是伦敦著名的“薄荷犀牛”夜总会的钢管舞舞者。

sentences.en: She remembered that she was going to the social club that evening.
sentences.cn: 她记起来那晚她正要去社交俱乐部。

sentences.en: That night the two men dined at Wilson's club.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上这两个男人在威尔逊俱乐部进了餐。

sentences.en: The club has moved its meeting to Saturday, January 22nd.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部已经把会议日期改到1月22号，星期六。

sentences.en: The club specialises in videoing its student golfers to correct their faults.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部专门为高尔夫学员制作录像，以纠正他们的错误。

sentences.en: The Farmers' Club is an organisation for people involved in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 农场主俱乐部是为农业界人士创办的组织。

sentences.en: The taxi drew up in front of the Riviera Club.
sentences.cn: 出租车在里维埃拉俱乐部门口停了下来。

sentences.en: This club has grown in stature over the last 20 years.
sentences.cn: 这家俱乐部在过去20年间知名度大增。

sentences.en: This season the club has had 73,500 season-ticket holders.
sentences.cn: 本赛季该俱乐部已经有73,500名持有季票的观众。

sentences.en: When the great man arrived, the club's manager personally escorted him upstairs.
sentences.cn: 那位要人到达时，俱乐部经理亲自陪他上楼。

sentences.en: Young players have got to be the way forward for every club.
sentences.cn: 培养年轻球员应该是所有俱乐部谋求发展之道。

trans.tran_cn: 俱乐部，夜总会，球杆，棍棒，（纸牌）梅花
trans.tran_en: a professional organization including the players, managers, and owners of a sports team
a professional organization including the players, managers, and owners of a sports team
to hit someone hard with a heavy object
